  • Method Details

    • isUserValid

      boolean isUserValid(String userName, String password)
      Checks if the given userName and password combination is valid.
      Parameters:
      userName - the userName to be checked
      password - the password to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the userName and password combination is valid, false otherwise

    • adminLogin

      boolean adminLogin(String userName, String password)
      Log in for Admin.
      Parameters:
      userName - the userName to be checked
      password - the password to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the userName and password combination is valid, false otherwise

    • adminChangePassword

      void adminChangePassword(String userName, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password of the admin.
      Parameters:
      userName - the userName of the admin
      oldPassword - the old password of the admin
      newPassword - the new password of the admin

    • viewAllGymOwners

      List<GymOwner> viewAllGymOwners()
      Retrieves a list of all Gym Owners.
      Returns:
      a list of Gym Owners

    • validateAllGymOwners

      void validateAllGymOwners()
      Validates all Gym Owners. This method validates each Gym Owner by updating their approval status.

    • validateGymOwnerByID

      void validateGymOwnerByID(String ownerId, int isApproved)
      Validates a Gym Owner by ID.
      Parameters:
      ownerId - the ID of the Gym Owner to validate
      isApproved - the approval status of the Gym Owner (1 for approved, 0 for not approved)

    • viewAllGymCentres

      List<GymCentre> viewAllGymCentres()
      Retrieves a list of all Gym Centres.
      Returns:
      a list of Gym Centres

    • validateAllGymCentres

      void validateAllGymCentres()
      Validates all Gym Centres. This method validates each Gym Centre by updating their approval status.

    • validateGymCentreByID

      void validateGymCentreByID(String gymCentreId, int isApproved)
      Validates a Gym Centre by its ID.
      Parameters:
      gymCentreId - the ID of the Gym Centre to validate
      isApproved - the approval status of the Gym Centre (1 for approved, 0 for not approved)
